This R Markdown file is designed to prepare, clean, and quality-check a multi-country panel dataset for empirical economic analysis, particularly for foreign aid, development indicators, and DEA/econometric applications.

-\> The entire workflow follows three broad objectives:

1.) Create a consistent panel dataset (Country Ã— Year Ã— Indicators)

2.) Identify missing, weak, or unreliable data

3.) Help decide which countries, indicators, and years form a balanced dataset.
